import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./Header.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[isScrolled,setIsScrolled]=useState(false);const[isMobileMenuOpen,setIsMobileMenuOpen]=useState(false);// Handle scroll effect for header
useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{setIsScrolled(window.scrollY>50);};window.addEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener('scroll',handleScroll);},[]);// Toggle mobile menu
const toggleMobileMenu=()=>{setIsMobileMenuOpen(!isMobileMenuOpen);};// Handle navigation click
const handleNavClick=sectionId=>{const element=document.getElementById(sectionId);if(element){element.scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});setIsMobileMenuOpen(false);}};// Handle Get Started button click
const handleGetStartedClick=()=>{// Scroll to contact section
document.getElementById('contact').scrollIntoView({behavior:'smooth'});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:`header ${isScrolled?'scrolled':''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container header-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"logo",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{children:["House",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Market"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:`nav-menu ${isMobileMenuOpen?'open':''}`,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#home",onClick:()=>handleNavClick('home'),children:"Home"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#services",onClick:()=>handleNavClick('services'),children:"Services"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#users",onClick:()=>handleNavClick('users'),children:"Users"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#pricing",onClick:()=>handleNavClick('pricing'),children:"Pricing"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#contact",onClick:()=>handleNavClick('contact'),children:"Contact"})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header-cta",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-primary",onClick:handleGetStartedClick,children:"Get Started"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mobile-menu-toggle",onClick:toggleMobileMenu,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{})]})]})});};export default Header;
